title: Full-Time Video Editor – Luxury Outdoor Living Brand (Reels, Ads, Website Content)
job_overview:
Company: Pergolas Signature
Location: Remote
Work Hours: Flexible, with at least some overlap with EST (Canada)
Salary: USD $500–$1,000/month (based on experience)
Start: ASAP

???? About Us
Pergolas Signature is a high-end outdoor living company based in Québec, Canada. We specialize in custom aluminum pergolas, outdoor kitchens, and luxury backyard transformations. We're growing fast and looking for a creative and reliable full-time video editor to join our content team.

???? What You'll Do
Edit raw footage from our job sites (drone, phone, camera)

Create short-form reels (IG, TikTok, YouTube Shorts) that are trendy yet polished

Produce high-end video ads for Meta, Google, YouTube

Build visual narratives for our website and brand videos

Add captions, transitions, light motion graphics, and branding

Color grading to match luxury tone

Export and organize deliverables cleanly for use by our marketing team

? What We’re Looking For
2+ years of video editing experience

Expert in Adobe Premiere Pro (or Final Cut)

Knowledge of After Effects or motion graphics is a big plus

Eye for cinematic visuals, strong storytelling

Ability to cut to music, understand pacing for reels and ads

Comfortable with Google Drive, ClickUp

Strong English communication (French is a bonus but not required)

Bonus if you’ve worked with construction, real estate, or design brands

???? What We Offer
Stable full-time remote role

Long-term opportunity with a growing Canadian brand

Supportive team with clear brand guidelines and video direction

Paid time off, holidays, and bonuses for great work
